name: Picture OCD
description:
HOW TO PLAY:
Get the highest score possible, by adjusting image with left and right arrow.
If you are playing with a phone click left and right side of your screen.

DESCRIPTION:
A game made for the Global Game Jam 2020 theme "REPAIR". Made in one afternoon for some shitz and giggles. We sure had fun and hope you will have fun too. Enjoy.

ASSETS:
- Everything except pictures was made and hand crafted by us
- Pictures were taken from https://unsplash.com/

PROGRAMS USED:
- Unity
- Bosca Ceoil
- Aseprite
- Audacity
- Pen and paper for planning

CREDITS:

https://smark.netlify.com/
